original_text: Then they gave money to the masons and carpenters, and gave food and drink and olive oil to the people of Sidon and Tyre, so that they would bring cedar logs by sea from Lebanon to Joppa, as authorized by Cyrus king of Persia.
korean_text: 이에 석수와 목수에게 돈을 주고 또 시돈 사람과 두로 사람에게 먹을 것과 마실 것과 기름을 주고 바사 왕 고레스의 명령대로 백향목을 레바논에서 욥바 해변까지 운송하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then they gave money to the masons and carpenters
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 석수와 목수들에게 돈을 주었고

sentences.original_text: and gave food and drink and olive oil
to the people of Sidon and Tyre
so that they would bring cedar logs by sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바다로 cedar 통나무를 가져오도록 하기 위함이었고

sentences.original_text: as authorized by Cyrus king of Persia
